content: Hui KONG – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau Skip to content Hui KONG孔慧 Associate Professor Personal Homepage: https://sites.google.com/view/huikonglab/home Academic Qualifications Postdoctoral fellow, Ecole Normal Superieure, Paris, France, 2010 Ph.D., School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, 2007. Master, School of Electrical Engineering, Jiangsu University, Jiangsu Province, China, 2002 Research Research Interests Sensing and perception for autonomous driving, SLAM, mobile robotics, multi-view geometry, motion planning.
